mapper.insert:
insert into IBDS_TEAM (TEAMNo, TEAM, TEAMOld, engTEAM, PLIPMTNo, PRODLINENo, PRODUCTNo, VERSIONNo, RELEASENo, Readers, Remark, Status, CREATED_USER, CREATED_DATE, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_DATA, STANDBY1, STANDBY2, STANDBY3, STANDBY4, STANDBY5, STANDBY6, STANDBY7, STANDBY8, STANDBY9, STANDBY10 ) values
(#{record.teamno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.team,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.teamold,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.engteam,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.plipmtno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.prodlineno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.productno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.versionno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.releaseno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.readers,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.remark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.createdUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.modifyUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.modifyData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.standby1,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.standby2,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.standby3,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.standby4,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.standby5,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.standby6,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.standby7,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.standby8,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.standby9,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{record.standby10,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )

update.foreach: update IBDS_TEAM set TEAM = #{record.team,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, engTEAM = #{record.engteam,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER = #{record.modifyUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, MODIFY_DATA = #{record.modifyData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id=#{record.id}
